name: Tile Link
description:
Spend hours of fun matching colorful tiles in a super exciting puzzle adventure! Link tiles to create a chain blast and clear the board, solve fun puzzles and win prizes!

Take on this exciting adventure and explore plenty of amazing puzzle levels filled with brain teasers and awesome challenges to keep your mind active. Don’t miss out on this free new match game. Download today and get the fun going!

- Tile Link is easy to pick up and play!
Enjoy all the fun puzzles and exercise your brain.


- Practice makes perfect- Train your brain and matching skills by solving all the fun puzzles. Enjoy this awesome match game with your family and friends, relax and have a blast with the most exciting tile linking adventure!

Tile Link cool FEATURES:
* Tons of challenging levels to explore. Complete the different missions set at the beginning of each level and master the challenges

* Fun gameplay with plenty of entertaining puzzles. Play anytime and anywhere, no internet or Wi-Fi connection is required
* Awesome boosters to help you solve the level
* High-quality graphics and effects
* Super addictive link game to share with family and friends


Want to relax and clear your mind? Try out this great matching game and dive into the tile linking fun! Tile Link is a perfect game to play while waiting for an appointment, during a boring meeting, or waiting in a long line.

PLAY NOW, develop your skills by playing everywhere, and as much as you want offline!
